item.description:
Hi come out an join us for fun night. We will start our night off by a Moonlight Snowshoe Hike through the College Woods the trip will begin and end at my house after the snowshoeing we will have a bonfire. Please bring your portable chair, some food for the potluck and any musical instrument that you want as long as it looks like a guitar!

Make sure you bring a flashlight!

We will be joined by other meetup groups so it should be a fun night!

My house is right next to "12 Hampshire Ave" my house is so new that it's not yet on the "gps" system or on any maps, I will have a "Tiki" torch next to my dirt driveway. Please park on the side of the road or driveway. Bring a flashlight if you can as it's quite dark.

If you have any wood that you would like to burn please bring it. A $5 or more donation would be greatly appreciated to help cover the cost or running this meetup group.

If anyone gets lost my telephone number is: 603-312-6735. If it rains or the winds are too high I will reschedule this event, please check back on this meetup site to see any updates.

See you all there!

Peter
item.name: Full Moon Snowshoe Hike/Bonfire
